content:
@Fabian Olsthoorn
New tarball for importing into OpenCPN:
https://cloudsmith.io/~mike-rossiter/repos/aisrx-alpha/packages/
Uses hashmap to eliminate duplicate VDM. Listing works to show the contents of the VDM.
I have used the format from in-innovative navigation GmbH.
Now working on jumping to the location for the message on the iENC chart.
(deleted)
Can't find an iENC chart for Leidschendam/Rijn-Schiekanaal. Is this a special?
hmm, not sure. a colleague gave me a big list of different bridges and such and i just copy pasted the fairway section and hectometre.
I have downloaded and installed the new tarbal, but OpenCPN crashes if i try and use it.
I will try with another Windows PC here. You may need to uninstall the previous version before using the new one.
It still crashes after an uninstall. If only crashes as soon at is recieves the message that TX is sending

Mike Rossiter said:

Can't find an iENC chart for Leidschendam/Rijn-Schiekanaal. Is this a special?

You can also use an other river if you want.
"TX is sending". Is this from the transceiver or aisTX_pi?
Both when I copy paste from aisTX_pi and when aisTX_pi sends it through the transciever.
Thanks. I can reproduce it. I will take a look after lunch.

The RIS database was corrupt. Replace the db in opencpn/plugins/aisRX/data with the file in the zip.
RIS.zip
You find the directory in appdata/local/opencpn
Latest tarball from Cloudsmith now working ok.
Yes, it works now. I can send the message over the transciever and then it automatically fills the RX screen.

Not really prod material but v0.5.2.1 is here:
https://cloudsmith.io/~mike-rossiter/repos/aisrx-prod/packages/
If you stop transmitting the Test button will decode the message entered in the text box.
My own aisTX is transmitting two text messages. List shows the messages and selecting one places a marker on the chart.
I've tested it and all the features work. Place markers sound very nice, can't wait too see it.

Place markers sound very nice, can't wait too see it.

In the list of messages clicking on the entry should generate the marker.
Ohh, is it the little windmill?
It should be a green pin near Den Haag. This is with v0.5.2.1. (From the prod packages)
Hmm, I can't see a anything near Den Haag. I do see a red marker saying 99.9 underneath plymouth, UK.
Ohh, sorry. I think i got the wrong package
Nice, it works! Looks very good.

Good.

red marker saying 99.9 underneath

That is just an artefact from code to draw objects on the chart.

Updated aisRX is here:
https://cloudsmith.io/~mike-rossiter/repos/aisrx-alpha/packages/detail/raw/aisRX-0.6-msvc-10.0.14393-tarball/0.6.0+76.35b53e2/
Github source here:
https://github.com/Rasbats/aisRX_pi/
Updated RIS.db in here:
RIS.7z
